form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: To WHOM IT MAY CONCERN, 1362 LELAND DRIVE YORKTOWN, N.Y. 10598

full_text: RAVI K. SHUKLA 1362 LELAND DRIVE YORKTOWN, N.Y.10598 To WHOM IT MAY CONCERN I Rani K. Shubla naturalized citizen of U.S.A. born on 4/15/1930 at Lahore (Pakistan) Currently residing at 1362 heland Drive, yorktown, N.Y. hereby Confirm the following: Shashe K. Shukla currently residing at 3223 Gomer Street, N.Y. is my brother. Mrs. Parrati D. Shukla who has applied for immigration visa is my mother I know this to he true from my personal knowledge since I and my brother grew up together and went to school in the same town. we have been Grange to together by the same parents. If you have any further Everthems, or need additional information, please advise me. STATE ur NEW YORK SS. Rain is small. COUNTY OF WESTCHESTER On the 24TH date of FEB 1975 2/17/75 before me personally came RAVI K SHUKLA to me known to be the person described in and who executed the within order, and acknowledged that he/ Notary ROBERT she executed the same. Robert E. convertied Public: in MAHER, County York Notary Public 30,1916
